transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Hello. Hi, good evening sir. Main Kela Devi Enterprises se main baat kar rahi hoon.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Main baat kar rahi hoon. Haan ji, haan ji, mam bataiye, bataiye.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji. I think Vishal ji aap baat kar rahe ho, hai na?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji, mam.
Executive: Ji. Ekta baat kar rahi hoon sir IndiaMART se. Aapka ek concern open hua hai na regarding your services, buyer calls vagera ke liye. Hmm. Haan ji, haan ji. To uske regarding main aap se connect hua tha. Amit Saneja ji ka connect hua tha aap se. But still sir, kuch na whatsapp pe images vagera provide karne the aapko, wo completely nahi hua abhi tak.
Customer: Mam, mam, main wo kar raha hoon mam. Main kar raha hoon. Sorry main bhool gaya tha thoda kaam vagera tha. Main bhi kar de raha hoon immediately.
Executive: Theek hai, aap unko share kar dijiye jo bhi images hai sir. Kyunki uske baad kya hota hai na sir, wo cheeze jab aapke catalog pe update hongi sir, buyer ki calls aapke paas tabhi aayengi jab sari cheeze update hongi.
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji. Abhi kar deta hoon.
Executive: Theek hai. Haan, aap share kar dijiye along with that aapka jo hai sir concern open hai sir, usko close kar sakte hain abhi?
Customer: Mam, abhi nahi mam. Ek baar na pura update ho jaane dijiye catalog ek baar mere ko dekhne dijiye uske baad.
Executive: Achha catalog vagera dekhne ke baad.
Customer: Haan ji, mam.
Executive: Koi dikkat nahi hai. Aap ek kaam kijiye aap unko mam ko aap share kariye images, theek hai? Catalog pe sari cheeze update kariye turant aapka kaam ho jayega. Okay?
Customer: Theek hai mam, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Alright mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs to share images on WhatsApp.

- Wants catalog to be updated.

- Wants to close concern after catalog update.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to share images for catalog update.

- Agreed to close concern after catalog update.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, images, buyleads, update, concern
